cards.rules_text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

{WU}: Blink Tempo
Bounce and exile your own creatures with enters the battlefield effects to outvalue opponents.
{UB}: Curse Control
Restrict your opponents resources and disrupt their gameplan by enchanting them with Aura Curses.
{BR}: Token Sacrifice
Get the most out of Treasure tokens and expendable creatures by sacrificing them to greater effect.
{RG}: Gold Adventures
Collect spells with Adventures and use a multitude of Treasure tokens to power them out.
{GW}: [/i][i]Delirium[/i] Midrange
Fill your graveyard in the early game and take advantage of cards that check for the diversity of cards there.
[i]{WB}: Second Spell
Cast two spells each turn to maximize effects in this color pair.
{UR}: Sabotage
Cast curses and spells that target opponents to get benefit from creatures in this color pair.
{BG}: Legendary Counters
Accolade creatures in this color pair go well with spells and abilities that care about +1/+1 counters.
{RW}: Vehicles
Use smaller creatures and tokens to crew Vehicles and safely attack your opponents.
{GU}: Surveil Merfolk
Spells and Merfolk that care about surveiling cards make up the brunt of this midrange color pair.
